product_name: Mountaineers Books The American Alpine Journal - 2013
long_description: . 2013 version features full-color photographs and expanded coverage of big climbs in the U.S. Edited by Dougald MacDonald, Lindsay Griffin and Erik Rieger. The American Alpine Club; copyright 2013.
short_description: The American Alpine Journal , published annually since 1929, is the world's foremost record of big new routes and remote mountain exploration.
